words.def: a light truck with an open body and low sides and a tailboard
a mischievous sprite of English folklore
the person or thing chosen or selected
a small open container usually used for drinking
a form of entertainment that enacts a story by sound and a sequence of images giving the illusion of continuous movement
young of any of various canines such as a dog or wolf
Ti, a plant native to the Pacific islands and China, Cordyline fruticosa.
the ratio of the circumference to the diameter of a circle
